== Atom Categories ==
_atom categories are used for DASe-specific metadata. some are actionable_

note: URL prefix is always http://daseproject.org/terms

note: maybe there should be BOTH /properties and /entities namespaces

|| category scheme URL || category type it applies to || possible values || can be changed w/ PUT ||
|| /type || all || item, collection, attribute, tag, search collection_list, attribute_list, comment || no ||
|| /collection || collection || <collection_ascii_id> || no ||
|| /item_type || item || <item_type_ascii_id> ||  yes ||
|| /item_count || collection, tag || (int) ||  no ||
|| /position || item, attribute || (int) ||  yes ||
|| /tag_type || tag || slideshow, cart, set, ?? || yes ||
|| /status || any || draft, delete, public ||  yes ||
|| /visibility || any || owner, group, public || yes ||
|| /html_input_type || attribute || text, textarea, select, radio, checkbox, noedit, list || yes ||
|| /background || tag, tag_item || hex code or colorname || yes ||
|| /metadata || item || term is att_ascii_id, value is value ||


figure out how tag visibility overrides collection visibility for items in tag.


==Atom Link relations ==

prefix is: http://daseproject.org/relation/
  
  * collection (a link to the collection that this feed/entry applies to)
  * collection/attributes (link to the attributes for this collection)
  * feed-link (used to populate the "up" link on a search item)
  * search-item (w/in a search result, appearing in an entry)
